item.description:
http://www.thedise.co...
Toadies with Gringo Star, Cassavettes
doors at 7 PM; 18+ show

The Toadies (with Gringo Star & Cassavettes) are playing at the Paradise Rock Club in Boston on Tuesday, Sept. 14- show starts @ 8pm! Tickets are $17 each (plus like $6 in stupid Ticketmaster fees)
http://www.ticketmast...

In case you're trying to remember who they are, their big (& awesome!) single was Possum Kingdom- check it out!
http://www.youtube.co...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the bar area by around 7:45pm if people want to meet me there before the show starts; I'll be wearing a Tool t-shirt ;) Will email my cell phone # to people RSVP'ed tomorrow.
item.name: Toadies @ the Paradise Rock Club- 9/14
